attributes.title: Orange God
attributes.review: I love my president so obviously I had to download this app but I quickly noticed that the app changed my whole life I started thinking that Muslims are terriosts,Minorities don’t deserve rights,Women belong in the kitchen,Wanting to date your own child was ok,And many other side effects.So I quickly came here to give a one star review just so others don’t experience the same things i did.

attributes.title: Trump rape my dog
attributes.review: So one day my dog and I were walking down the street and trump was on the street too I try to run but he chase after me I let go of my dog bc I didn’t want to get rape by him but he grab my dog and started going to work on him I am screaming for help but no one came.... Then trump took a poop on the street and started eating it...I was disgusted .....then he started undressing himself and ran down the street raping everybody dogs my innocent eyes were ruin for life

attributes.title: i lost my shoes
attributes.review: hey guys i left my shoes at my summer camp and i just got them so if y’all could venmo me @Anna-premo4 so i could get a new pair i’d really appreciate it

attributes.title: WORST APP 😡
attributes.review: Trump is the worst president the USA has ever had he is a rapist and colorist and a low life who has nothing else better to do than take is power for granted this app took about 24 hours to download and once it did download the app started talking like a voice over threatening my family if we don’t vote for him then the once I exited the app my phone was glitching with random pictures of trump as 2020 president after that my family started acting strange and they all started protesting for trump as president and now I ran away Bc my family was trying to kill me now I’m in the sewer eating baloney with hallucinations of trump controlling my family 😰this app is very dangerous and may cause brain damage.download at your own risk

attributes.title: What is this hunny?
attributes.review: This app is butt like our president....

attributes.title: My fridge is gone
attributes.review: Hello everyone,My name is Karen,I downloaded this app to get my political side going,but something just awful happened.I was going to get a late night snack...when suddenly my fridge starts flying all around my house 😔 it was constantly saying “chiNa chiNa chiNa” And to think I thought nothing could get any worse.....my furniture starts SINGING “Come on down and get some corn or we will sacrifice your newborn” I was scared for my life,but then it clicked...it was the apps fault so I immediately deleted it.Never will I get this app again.Anyways guys Live Love Laugh ❤️✨🌸

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: It took me so long to download! And the thing is, it wasn’t even worth it!! I was trying to find reason to like trump because everyone deserves a second chance.But then everything synced in and I was like, no I’m not doing it.
